about_the_game:
Frog isn't just another low effort clicker game, We're committed to creating an experience that the community loves. We regularly add new features and frogs based on community feedback, ensuring that the game continues to evolve and stay exciting. Frog is built to stay for the long run!

Every 2 hours, you can get a random frog with different rarities to grow your collection. Here’s what you can expect:

Features:

  • Big variety of fancy frogs
  • A welcoming community
  • Shop
  • Collection
  • Crafting
  • Visable Inventory in-game
  • Rankings and Leaderboard
  • Multiplayer Lobbys
  • Exciting events
  • Design submission via our discord! All Frogs are made with community effort and inspiration, come join the fun!

Features to be added in near future:

  • Trade ups
  • And more!

name: Frog

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or newer
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

We regularly add new features and frogs based on community feedback, ensuring that the game continues to evolve and stay exciting. Frog is built to stay for the long run!
